name: Street Soccer Cup 2019
description:
Your search for a quality street football game is over, here comes the realistic street soccer game with dynamic and immersive music. Download this game for ultimate fun. Your objective should be to beat your opponent with the highest number of goals.

The new soccer physics is quickest and authentic. There is a quick play mode where you just have to pick your team and the opponent team and enjoy the real simulation of this soccer game

Street soccer is a real soccer simulation game with stunning graphics and smooth gameplay.


=======
Controls
=======
-Smart joystick control can be used to move player
-Sprint control to boost up running speed
-Kick control to make a powerful kick
-Pass control to pass the ball to friendly player
-Tackle control to snatch ball from opponent player when its near


=======
Rewards
=======
-Get incentive coins on winning a game.
-Using these coins you can unlock T-Shirts



============
Street Stadium
============
-Elegant new street stadium located somewhere near busy street
-Full of enthusiastic soccer fans and cheerleaders.
- New stadiums added


===========
Game Modes
===========
-There are multiple teams picked from the world’s top chart.
-Select your team from the world’s top teams of beach soccer and start the match.
-You can also select the opponent team to play with.


==========
Social Features
==========
-Shout on social media when you manage to beat your opponent team in match
-Invite friends to play game

=======
Feedback
=======
If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email. In case something is not working correctly please let us know, I’ll be glad to fix that.
Please post comments and feedback. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.

Thanks
